aka: 桔子镇贵妇的真实生活
this_title: The Real Housewives of Orange County Season 7
trans_title: 橘子郡娇妻 第七季
桔子镇贵妇的真实生活
introduction: Vicki finalizes her divorce and is focused on finding happiness, starting with putting the house up for sale and spending time with her new man, Brooks. Busy mom Alexis has a new job as a morning news show correspondent, and after a three-year feud, Tamra and Gretchen meet to bury the hatchet once and for all. Tamra continues to sell real estate to make ends meet, and shows a very expensive property to filthy rich Heather Dubrow - a former actress, now mother of four - whom she later invites to a dinner party at Vicki's house.
chinese_title: 橘子郡娇妻 第七季
foreign_title: The Real Housewives of Orange County Season 7
